title: Azure Titans Looking for Serious, Dedicated Players
body:
Hey all,

Azure Titans (name is a WIP) are currently looking for more members, particularly in mid lane and top. We are looking for someone who can communicate well with a team, play on a consistent level and be reliably available for practices and scheduled games.
Put simply, we play to win.
Please fill out your details below and post them in the comments, I'll add and trial those who meet our requirements.

Age:
Role:
Top 3 Picks:
Comms (Y/N):
Time Zone:
Availability:

EDIT: We are no longer looking for anyone, but feel free to post your details or add me in-game, if anything changes I can hit you up!
Also, I changed my IGN to pine cones.

replies.body:
Age: 25 
Role: Supp main>mid>adc
Top 3 Picks:
Supp: Sona/Janna/Leona
Mid: Ahri/Leblanc/Syndra
ADC: Jinx/Lucian/Vayne

Availability: Most nights unless i start work
